mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, p.* from (select product_id, product_title, product_content, product_price, product_gender, product_category, product_img, wm_concat(product_color) product_color, wm_concat(product_size) product_size from tbl_product group by product_id, product_title, product_content, product_price, product_gender, product_category, product_img) p) where product_id = #{product_id}

select * from (select rownum rnum, p.* from (select product_id, product_title, product_content, product_price, product_gender, product_category, product_img, wm_concat(product_color) product_color, wm_concat(product_size) product_size, product_saled from tbl_product, (select product_id product_option_id, sum(product_saled) product_saled from tbl_product_option group by product_id) where product_id = product_option_id group by product_id, product_title, product_content, product_price, product_gender, product_category, product_img, product_saled) p
and (product_title like '%'||#{search_keyword}||'%' or product_content like '%'||#{search_keyword}||'%' or product_category like '%'||#{search_keyword}||'%' or product_gender like '%'||#{search_keyword}||'%' or product_color like '%'||#{search_keyword}||'%' or product_size like '%'||#{search_keyword}||'%')
and product_gender = #{product_gender}
and product_category = #{product_category}
and product_category != '악세사리'
and product_color like '%'||#{select_color}||'%'
and product_size like '%'||#{select_size}||'%'
)
rnum between ((#{product_pageNum}-1)*12)+1 and (#{product_pageNum}*12)
order by product_saled desc
order by product_id desc
order by product_price
order by product_price desc
